text: Ned Wynn (April 27, 1941 â€“ December 20, 2020) was an American actor and screenwriter. He was born in New York City. He played Alonzo in The Absent- Minded Professor (1961) and Son of Flubber (1963). He also played Luke in Stagecoach (1966). Wynn was the son of actor Keenan Wynn and grandson of Ed Wynn. Wynn died on December 20, 2020 in Sonoma County, California from Parkinson's disease-related problems, aged 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Screenwriters from New York City Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease
title: Ned Wynn
